scripts.test:cypress:open: start-server-and-test 'npm run dev --no-open' 8000 'npm run cypress -- open'
scripts.test:cypress:component: start-server-and-test 'npm run dev --no-open' 8000 'npm run cypress -- run --browser chrome --spec "cypress/integration/component_tests/*.feature" --env allure=true'
scripts.test:cypress:browserstack: start-server-and-test 'npm run dev --no-open' 8000 'npm run open:ember' 4200 'browserstack-cypress run'
scripts.test:allure:report: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open  allure-report
scripts.test:cypress:run: npm run test:cypress:local && npm run test:allure:report
scripts.test:cypress:tag: start-server-and-test 'npm run dev --no-open' 8000 './node_modules/.bin/cypress-tags run -e TAGS='@inputter' --browser chrome'
scripts.open:ember: cd examples/ember-app && npm install && npm run build-muon && ember serve
scripts.test:percy:ember: start-server-and-test 'npm run open:ember' 4200 'percy exec ./node_modules/.bin/cypress-tags run -e TAGS='@cake' --browser chrome'
scripts.test:cypress:ember: start-server-and-test 'npm run open:ember' 4200 'npm run cypress -- run --browser chrome --spec "cypress/integration/example_app_tests/*.feature" --env allure=true'
scripts.test:cypress:local: npm run test:cypress:component && npm run test:cypress:ember
